claude-code.description: Claude Code (built-in file tools + router-first enforcement). Prefer semantic MCP tools when available; otherwise use repo tools and minimal Read/Grep/Search.

cursor.description: Cursor IDE (often strong built-in indexing). Prefer repo tools and semantic MCP tools; avoid high-fanout scans from orchestrators.

codex.description: Codex CLI (MCP behaviors differ). Prefer explicit tool invocations and deterministic scripts; keep outputs file-based.
